DOC.brief_summary: A novel treatment metastatic melanoma combine laser immune-system stimulating cream .
DOC.detailed_description: A novel treatment metastatic melanoma combine laser immune-system stimulate cream without injection substance make tumor sensitive laser .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Subjects must Stage III IV melanoma histologically confirm cutaneous metastatic malignant melanoma tumor site . 3 . Subjects must measurable disease . See section 10.2 evaluation measurable disease ( RECIST ) . 4 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 02 5 . Required laboratory parameter ( blood test must obtain within 14 day prior start study treatment ) : Platelet count > 40,000 per mm3 Absolute Neutrophil Count ( ANC ) > 1,500 per mm3 1 . Life expectancy , opinion investigator le 4 month 2 . Known allergy drug use treatment 3 . Immunosuppression , include HIV positive subject , use systemic steroid daily immunosuppressive medication within 1 month treatment 4 . Chemotherapy/immunotherapy within 4 week initiation 5 . Local chemotherapy immunotherapy target lesion 4 week initiation 6 . Radiation therapy treatment site within 4 week initiation 7 . Uncontrolled brain metastasis 8 . History cutaneous photosensitization photodermatoses 9 . Nontreated , active cancer melanoma nonmelanoma skin cancer . 10 . Active infectious disease require antibiotic therapy 11 . Unstable medical illness 12 . Past present major psychiatric illness 13 . Pregnant lactate woman 14 . End stage renal disease serum creatinine great upper limit normal creatinine clearance < 50cc/min 15 . Acute hepatitis ( cause )
